name: Missile Pong
description:
Player 1: E and D to move, Shift to shoot.

Player 2: Up and Down Arrows to move, Ctrl to shoot.

Space to Restart

1 and 2 to change the background. It's blank by default because some people get dizzy.

This game was made in 9 hours for the Triple Trijam game jam! Art
I decided to change the controls to EDSF and Arrow Key based for Accesibility. Apparently people in France don't have WASD. Also most cheap keyboards and older keyboards can't register more than 3 or so keys at a time, with the exception of some special ones like shift and alt.

Credits

Artist and Game Programmer: Safir

Game Consultant and Play Tester: TheBoog

Musician and SFX Designer: LiterallyHades

Software used: Godot Game Engine, Aseprite, BFXR, Reaper, Kilohearts Snap Heap

The Explosion assets were made by Will Tice of unTiedGames. You can find their stuff here: https://www.patreon.com/bePatron?c=165655&rid=201537
